title: The Oath and the man: a story of the French Revolution
brief_description: A tale of love and revenge set in Paris during the French Revolution. Cast includes Edward Dillon, Marion Leonard, Arthur V. Johnson, Florence Barker, Henry B. Walthall, Francis J. Grandon. Silent film with English intertitles.
